1.title: The Sound Panorama
1.description: The Sound Panorama is an intuitive guide through the world of the weird sides of music. For a couple of years, we tried to experiment with the form of the typical radio broadcast, making our program more or less conceptual. In the broadcast we could speak backwards and fit all the 108 Haydnâ€™s Symphonies in 5 minutes. Impressive, huh?
